name: Alfio R Github Site
tagline: A small site being hosted on Github that allows me to showcase work I've done.
body:
Welcome. While there is nothing here at the moment other than my repositories. It allows me to have a place where I can showcase work I've done in all aspects of the technology field. This is a field that I enjoy working in daily and enjoy the challenges that are presented to me.

You can also preview some of my other work on my blog at http://alfioraymond.wordpress.com

Thank you and enjoy.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
